nodes.text: Gartros were small dragon-like avian creatures that lived on Coruscant. They had bat-like wings,[source?] spiked tails, and jaws filled with sharp teeth. Gartros were omnivorous and completely harmless, though many Coruscanti hated them because they formed into vast shrieking flocks.[source?]

The eggs of the gartro were served as a delicacy at Dex's Diner alongside nerf steak, protato wedges, and Quor'sav-fried steak.[source?] They were also served pickled, for 3.7 credits for three, or as a gartro egg omelet.[source?]
